item.description:
Mission Impossible 3 is playing at the Boston Commons 19, this Saturday. If you plan on coming i would buy your tickets in advance on www.fandango.com The movie time is 6:15. So we could get together for an early meet up for something to eat or catch a bite to eat after. I think this is the first weekend out. If you don't want to get together before to eat....meet me inside the movie theater right underneath the sign that says THEATERS 3-19..it's right in the main area you can't miss the sign it's all lit up. The showing time is 6:15, that means get to the meeting spot by 5:30 unless you want to go out for something to eat...email me back...I think it will be nice to get together before the show...rsdragon@optonline.net....AIM rsthelastdragon...

Ross
item.name: MEDFORD/BOSTON MOVIE GOERS FAN MEETUP GROUP Meetup
